trustfund:
TF027128-PHRD-SOCIAL DEVELOPMENT FUND PROJECT,TF040469-ROMANIA:  SOCIAL DEVELOPMENT
            FUND (APL PHASE II)

abstracts.cdata!:
Ratings for the Romania Project in
            Support of the Second Phase of the Social Development Fund
            Program were as follows: outcomes were highly satisfactory,
            the risk to development outcome was low or negligible, the
            Bank performance was satisfactory, and the Borrower
            performance was satisfactory. Some lessons learned included:
            supervision of social fund investments needs to emphasize
            technical quality, including environmental aspects;
            facilitation is essential to the impact of social funds;
            bureaucratization of social fund mechanisms should be
            resisted; M&E is a useful tool for ensuring
            sustainability; social funds can have a broader impact if
            they focus beyond narrow implementation; social funds can
            contribute to EU accession and integration; and change
            management takes time and should not be left to the end of
            the project.
